publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / beta maṣāḥǝft

sourceDesc.p: A TEI file created from Ethio-SPaRe data

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5

place.settlement: wäräda Gulo Mäkäda, ṭabiya Hagärä Sälam, qušät Sǝddäyto

note.ab: Däbr. Under the slope of the rock, there are remains of a small church (chapel?) and a typical burial (in a small cave, creened off by a small wall). From that place, one can see the upper church of Taḥtay Ruba Maryam (TRM) located on the peak of the rock.

23 Mss. photographed: SGM-001 “Homily of St. Mary”; SGM-002 “Four Gospels”; SGM-003 “The Book of the Rite of the Passion Week”; SGM-004 “Homily on St. Michael”; SGM-005 “Miracles of Jesus”; SGM-006 “Story of the Trinity”; SGM-007 “The Rite of the Holy Week”; SGM-008 “Book of the Funeral Rite”; SGM-009 “Missal”; SGM-010 “Homily on the Saviour of the World ”; SGM-011 “The Dǝggwa of the Lent”; SGM-012 “Psalter”; SGM-013 “Pauline Epistles”; SGM-014 “Prayer of Incense”; SGM-015 “The Book of Baptism”; SGM-016 “Homily of the Life-Giver”; SGM-017 “Missal”; SGM-018 “The Vita and Miracles of Mäzgäbä Śǝllase”; SGM-019 “fols. 5-121 Homily of Michael; fols. 122-153 The Miracles of Samuʾel”; SGM-020 “Hymnary”; SGM-021 “Miracles of Mary”; SGM-022 “Psalter”; SGM-023 “Miracles of Mary”.
Tabots of Michael, Mary, Trinity, Ṣadǝqan of Ṗäraqliṭos (recently introduced), Libanos.
